### Feature Summary

A summary of the feature along with reason to add/update it. â›·

### For a new feature 

1. Which section should have it
2. Currently working examples or screenshot or drawings

### For an existing feature 

1. What is the current behaviour
2. What is the expected behaviour

If you know how to add it, raise a PR and let's discuss the code. ðŸ¤–
